ai-tha-ap381:1.1_0: “There is no need for the Fortunate One,
ai-tha-ap381:1.4_0: stood in front of the gods.
ai-tha-ap381:2.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-tha-ap381:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap381:2.4_0: all the trees that are very fruitful,
ai-tha-ap381:4.1_0: It was so welcome for me
ai-tha-ap381:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Sumana.
ai-tha-ap381:7.1_0: In order to give the (whole) Elder Sumana,
